name: Santa Fell in the Wrong House
name_original: Santa Fell in the Wrong House
description:
Hey there peeps! 

"Santa Fell in the Wrong House" is a small horror experience I designed in 72 Hours as a Thank You to everyone who played my first solo project - Mirror Forge and to wish you Merry Christmas, Happy New Year, and Happy Holidays!

In this tiny retro-styled horror game, you play as Santa Claus. After being tricked into going down the chimney of a weird large mansion, someone smacked Santa from the back and stole his last remaining 8 presents.

Roam in a creepy, retro-styled mansion looking for the presents and bring them all back to Santa's bag near the fireplace while being chased around by a demonic entity.

Game features:

• Over 30 randomized variations of the presents' spawning locations providing more situations and replayability

• Hide in Christmas lockers to avoid the demon

• Massive Jumpscare if caught

• Use a Magic star to light your way - one that starts a Christmas song when you come near a present and helps you find it

• The lights can be turned on throughout the entire mansion via a single lever,  but then, the countdown starts until they go off again.

• The demon increases in difficulty the more presents you collect

Enjoy and stay safe!
